nodes.text: Griff Praji was a Human male born to the wealthy and influental House Praji of Coruscant, the capital world of the Galactic Republic, sometime before or during 60 BBY in the Great Peace of the Republic era. Griff had two younger siblings: Tannon and another brother. His mother instilled in him an appreciation for culture and the fine arts, so he studied both what the capital offered in abundance and also life outside Coruscant. Praji often participated in family vacations that traveled to such offworld places as the museums of Porus Vida and the Sharu ruins of the Rafa system.

Griff Praji had a son named Nahdonnis, whose daughter was Tyla. Griff Praji's brother, Tannon, married a woman named Maree and sired a daughter, Onnelly, Griff Praji's niece. In 104 ABY, the historian Dr. Gabrel Treon mentioned Griff Praji briefly in his article about the House Praji family, Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Praji: A Cartel of Genes.
Griff Praji was first mentioned in Nathan O'Keefe's Tinker, Tailor, Soldier, Praji, a Hyperspace-exclusive in-universe history article published on February 5 2009.
